name: High-paid, long-term deal Template
description: Hight paid deal, allows influencer to receive rewards from a brand annually

meta.html: Greetings from SufferInfluence Bot, i feel like i have a good proposal to you from customer ${customer_name}. This customer wish to pay you ${deal_amount} to represent its brand on annual base in social.

name: Friendly, one time deal Template
description: Standard, low payable deal, allows influencer to pepresent brand once

meta.html: Greetings from SufferInfluence Bot, i feel like i have a good proposal to you from customer ${customer_name}. This customer wish to pay you ${deal_amount} to represent its brand in social.
